description:
Ever wondered how you can get on the megahit show, Shark Tank, to pitch your business or great idea? Well here's your chance to learn exactly how from Fran Harris, a 20-year TV veteran, ESPN Announcer, former HGTV reality series host, and multiple reality TV show cast member.

In "Shark Tank Audition Playbook" Fran reveals the inside scoop on applying and auditioning for the hit show, Shark Tank. In this entertaining and high-octane course, you'll get access to the uncensored roadmap & blueprint on

  • How Reality TV Works
  • How To Apply For Shark Tank
  • How To Audition The Right Way
  • How To Pitch Like A Pro

Fran reveals those dirty little secrets that nobody but insiders know, in a fun, easy to learn environment that'll inspire you to pitch your "BIG" idea on the #1 show for entrepreneurs.
title: Shark Tank Audition Playbook
